channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 20:01 The threat of artebors in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community.
item.description: 游리 20:01 The threat of artebors in Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
